select tenderrecord.USER_ID, fixBorrow.CONTRACT_NO as FIX_CONTRACT_NO, fixBorrow.LOCK_ENDTIME, borrow.`NAME` as BORROW_NAME, borrow.CONTRACT_NO, tenderrecord.PARENT_ID as PARENT_CONTRACT_NO, tenderrecord.ACCOUNT, tenderrecord.ADDTIME, tenderrecord.`STATUS` from rocky_b_tenderrecord tenderrecord INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fixBorrow on tenderrecord.USER_ID= fixBorrow.ID INNER JOIN rocky_borrow borrow on tenderrecord.BORROW_ID = borrow.ID where 1=1
and tenderrecord.USER_ID = #{fixBorrowId}
and fixBorrow.CONTRACT_NO like concat('%',#{fixContractNo},'%')
and borrow.`NAME` like concat('%',#{borrowName},'%')
and borrow.CONTRACT_NO like concat('%',#{contractNo},'%')
order by tenderrecord.addtime desc

and tenderrecord.USER_ID = #{fixBorrowId}
